title: FanDuel Sportsbook app can't confirm my location due to a proxy? I have location on.
content:
I signed up for FanDuel Sportsbook and it says it cannot determine my location even though I gave it location permission and have location turned on in settings.

The app says it cannot determine my location due to a VPN or proxy setting. I've tried to remedy this but cannot find a fix, and their support doesn't have an answer.

Anyone have any helpful advice so I can use this app?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
